tasks.label: unit tests
tasks.command: Get-ChildItem -Path ./source/ -Recurse -Filter *Tests.csproj | ForEach-Object { $job = Start-Job -ScriptBlock { param($projectPath) & dotnet test $projectPath } -ArgumentList $_.FullName; Wait-Job $job; Receive-Job $job | Select-Object -Last 1; Remove-Job $job }
